query_guide.description: This is a structured representation of the D&D 5e SRD. Use the section IDs to request specific content.

main_categories.title: Using Ability Scores
main_categories.summary: Section: Using Ability Scores. Contains combat rules or mechanics. Includes lists of items or features

main_categories.title: The Planes of Existence
main_categories.summary: Section: The Planes of Existence. Contains spell-related information

search_tips: Use the searchable_index to find sections by keywords
Request sections by their ID for specific content
Check metadata for content type (tables, lists, etc.)
Use the path to understand section hierarchy
